description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Great War of 189-. A forecast. By Rear-Admiral P. Colomb, Colonel J. F. Maurice, R.A., Captain F. N. Maude, Archibald Forbes, Charles Lowe, D. Christie Murray, and F. Scudamore. With illustrations from sketches specially made for “Black and White” by F. Villiers" Author: COLOMB, Philip Howard. Contributor: FORBES, Archibald - War Correspondent of the “Daily News.' Contributor: LOWE, Charles - M.A Contributor: MAUDE, Frederic Natusch. Contributor: Maurice, John Frederick - Sir Contributor: MURRAY, David Christie - Novelist Contributor: SCUDAMORE, Frank. Contributor: VILLIERS, Frederic. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012634.m.10." Page: 43 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: William Heinemann Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000751301 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
